item.description:
If you're signed up for the Let's Run Series and would like to meet up before the race please RSVP Yes and I'll send out my contact info.

I'm running at about 11 minutes per mile so we probably won't be able to run together, but we can certainly gather afterwards for a drink or a chicken wing!

The series is currently SOLD OUT! So, unfortunately, if you were hoping to sign up late there isn't any space left.
item.how_to_find_us: I'll wear a bright green/yellow running hat.

group.name: Boston Informal Running Club: Home of TMIRCE:BOS

item.name: Reggae Ramble on The Charles (Cambridge)
